name: Scroogle search results dark
description:
update - even darker, with new styles for link colors and the bold words (search terms)

original description - This is for the Scroogle search results page. Scroogle is an old proxy that protects users' privacy from Google searches!
additional_info:
version 2.1 darkens the bold words to make them legible against Scroogle's colored
backgrounds. I accidentally made them too bright.
